Jeweler's Tools.Description: Training with jeweler's tools includes the basic techniques needed to beautify gems. It also gives you expertise in identifying precious stones.
Jeweler's Tools.Components: Jeweler's tools consist of a small saw and hammer, files, pliers, and tweezers.

Skills.Arcana: Proficiency with jeweler's tools grants you knowledge about the reputed mystical uses of gems. This insight proves handy when you make Arcana checks related to gems or gem-encrusted items.
Skills.Investigation: When you inspect jeweled objects, your proficiency with jeweler's tools aids you in picking out clues they might hold.
